alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 10:48AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern San Diego County through 1115 AM PDT... At 1047 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of I-8 Between Boulevard And Imperial County Line, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... I-8 Between Boulevard And Imperial County Line, I-8 Between Pine Valley And Boulevard, Boulevard, Mountain Spring, and Jacumba. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains
